definition: a white crystalline carbohydrate used as a sweetener and preservative, sweeten with sugar
details:
noun
- a white crystalline carbohydrate used as a sweetener and preservative
= synonyms: refined sugar
- informal terms for money
= synonyms: boodle
- an essential structural component of living cells and source of energy for animals
= example: an essential structural component of living cells and source of energy for animals
= synonyms: carbohydrate, saccharide
verb
- sweeten with sugar
= example: sweeten with sugar
= synonyms: saccharify
